name: ILP#2
description:
[Gameplay Instructions]

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left click to shoot

ESC to return to main menu

R to reset after game over

Objective

Targets will appear in random locations and slowly disappear after a set time

Shoot as many targets as you can

If a target disappears before you shoot it you will lose a life

Lose all of your lives and it's game over
